title: Introduction
description: Get started with FlexiUI, a modern React UI library.

body.raw:
# Introduction Welcome to FlexiUI - a beautiful, fast, and modern React UI library. ## What is FlexiUI? FlexiUI is a modern, open-source React UI library that provides a comprehensive set of accessible, customizable components with a powerful theming system built on Tailwind CSS. Whether you're building a simple landing page or a complex web application, FlexiUI provides all the tools you need to create beautiful, accessible, and performant user interfaces. ## Key Features - **Themeable:** Customize every component with our powerful theme system built on Tailwind CSS - **Accessible:** Built on React Aria for world-class accessibility with keyboard navigation and screen reader support - **TypeScript:** Fully typed with comprehensive IntelliSense support - **Fast & Lightweight:** Optimized bundle size with tree-shaking support - **Responsive:** Mobile-first design that works seamlessly across all devices - **Modular:** Import only what you need for maximum flexibility ## Why FlexiUI? FlexiUI stands out from other UI libraries by focusing on three core principles: - **Developer Experience:** Intuitive API, comprehensive documentation, and excellent TypeScript support - **Accessibility First:** Every component is built with accessibility in mind from the ground up - **Performance:** Optimized for speed with minimal bundle size and maximum flexibility ## Getting Started Ready to start building? Check out our installation guide to get FlexiUI set up in your project.
Installation Guide Browse Components
## Community & Support FlexiUI is open source and built by a community of developers. We welcome contributions, bug reports, and feature requests! - [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/flexi-ui/flexi-ui) - [Report Issues](https://github.com/flexi-ui/flexi-ui/issues)
